answers.author: Israel Murguia
answers.text:
Attached is FEMA's National Disaster Housing Strategy which provides an overview of local government's role in support of housing. In particular, you  want to see  page 15. I hope this helps in the meantime while I try to find a specific report.

author: Charles Dean
text: Are there any case studies or reports on the role of city and county government's in support of housing for disaster victims?
title: Housing for disaster victims
